sentence.Network_en: The legend of Bigfoot dates back centuries.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于大足野人的传说可以回溯至几个世纪以前.

sentence.Network_en: Tenacious image explorers might locate Little Bigfoot towards the front left of the resolution panorama.
sentence.Network_cn: 若果你够坚持的话就能在这张高清晰全景影像中的左前方找到这个小野人岩石.

sentence.Network_en: For decades, large , hairy, manlike beasts called Bigfoot e occasionally been reported by eyewitnesses across America.
sentence.Network_cn: 几十年当中, 美国各地都不时有目击者声称自己看到了人称“大脚”的巨型多毛人形野兽.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大脚（BigFoot）是一款向魔兽世界玩家提供便利的插件，BigFoot完全使用暴雪官方提供的用户接口第三方开......魔兽大脚插件官网最 …

encyclopedia.content: 大脚（BigFoot）是一款向魔兽世界玩家提供便利的插件，BigFoot完全使用暴雪官方提供的用户接口第三方开发，即BigFoot提供的辅助功能在当前游戏版本下完全被暴雪官方和网易认可。

means.word_mean: 1. large hairy humanoid creature said to live in wilderness areas of the United States and Canada

auth_sentence.content: How clever you are, ridiculing the bigfoot believers.
auth_sentence.res_content: How clever you are, ridiculing the bigfoot believers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How clever you are, ridiculing the bigfoot believers.

auth_sentence.content: The two discoverers apparently put on "Bigfoot expeditions".

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two discoverers apparently put on "Bigfoot expeditions".

auth_sentence.content: I had lunch yesterday with Bigfoot as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had lunch yesterday with Bigfoot as well.
